name: Deepest Dark
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN GOAL

YOU MUST OBTAIN THE RELIC AT THE BOTTOM OF THE OCEAN.
DIVE DEEP. DIVE FAST. DIVE CAREFULLY.

THERE IS NO DANGER. YOUR LIFE IS SAFE.

CONTROLS

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement

SPACEBAR - Dash

This game was made for the ArtCenter Game Jam with the theme Through the Darkness.
